docs.lead_paragraph: The Food and Drug Administration has issued warning letters to five distributors of pure powdered caffeine, saying the products put consumers at risk.

headline.main: FDA Issues Warning Letters to Powdered Caffeine Distributors
headline.print_headline: FDA Issues Warning Letters to Powdered Caffeine Distributors

docs.snippet: The Food and Drug Administration has issued warning letters to five distributors of pure powdered caffeine, saying the products put consumers at risk.
